source.d3516e95:
def correlation_heatmap(data):
    _, ax = plt.subplots(figsize = (15, 10))
    colormap= sea.diverging_palette(220, 10, as_cmap = True)
    sea.heatmap(data.corr(), annot=True, cmap = colormap)

correlation_heatmap(data)
